inclusion.criterion: Pre-operative thyroidectomy patients with pathology-proven papillary thyroid cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PTC needing lymph node staging for potential neck dissection.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of prior surgery within the head and neck.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of prior radiation to the head and neck.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of lymphoma, leukemia, or other lymphoproliferative disorders affecting the head and neck.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with history of XRT to neck, but no prior surgery or radiation within head and neck. No mention of lymphoma, leukemia, or other lymphoproliferative disorders affecting the head and neck.
